mapper.select:
select A.*, ( select DISTINCT B.express_data from p_express B where A.ship_code = B.express_code and B.fid = A.id )as expressData, (select c.trade_no from b_pay_log c where A.id=c.order_id order by create_time desc limit 1) AS tradNo, D.name as orgName from p_order A left join p_pawn_org D on A.org_id = D.id where 1 = 1
and A.goods_source = 3
and A.org_id = 0 and A.goods_source = 2
and A.goods_source = 2
and A.goods_source = 4
and A.goods_source = 5
and A.goods_name like '%${goodsName}%'
and A.code like '%${orderCode}%'
and A.state = #{state}
and A.pay_type = #{payType}
order by A.create_time desc
mapper.update: update p_order set state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ship_firm = #{shipFirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_code = #{shipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, (CASE o.state WHEN -1 THEN '已取消' WHEN 1 THEN '等待付款' WHEN 2 THEN '已付款' WHEN 3 THEN '已发货' WHEN 4 THEN '确认收货' WHEN 5 THEN '已评价' ELSE '状态未知' END ) order_estate, (CASE o.is_balance WHEN 1 THEN '已结算' WHEN 0 THEN '未结算' ELSE '状态未知' END ) order_eIsBalance, u.name user_name FROM p_order o LEFT JOIN b_user u on o.user_id = u.id where o.id = #{id} ORDER BY o.create_time desc
select A.* from p_order A where A.state = 1 and A.create_time < #{time}
select A.* from p_order A where A.state = 1 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,A.create_time,now()) > 30
